name: postit-master
description: - A simple, light weight communication platform for web developers - It is a fully front-end app made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript (and webpack and babel dependencies and packages) - You can find the deployed project at https://belloosagienoah.github.io/postit/ - You can also find the project repository at https://github.com/belloosagienoah/postit - See more of my projects at https://github.com/belloosagienoah/ - Website at [`TechStack`](https://techstack.surge.sh) - You can support me on [kofi](https://ko-fi.com/ts4all)
author: Bello Osagie Noah
